Body:
template = """
            <%page cached="True", args="a, b"/>

            some template
        """
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n            ', (1, 1)),
    PageTag('page', {'args': 'a, b', 'cached': 'True'}, (2, 13), []), Text(
    """

            some template
        """, (2, 48))]))
